guide.title: How to activate your automations
guide.intro: Follow these 4 simple steps so your followers receive an automatic DM whenever they comment a keyword on your posts.

step1.title: Connect your Meta account
step1.desc: Go to Settings ‚Üí Connections and connect your professional Instagram and/or Facebook account (Page or Creator Account).

step2.title: Check messaging access
step2.desc: From your Instagram account or Facebook Page, make sure DMs and messages are enabled in your privacy settings.

step3.title: Create your automation here
step3.desc: Choose a trigger keyword (e.g. PDF, GUIDE, PROMO) and write the message your followers will automatically receive in their DMs.

step4.title: Test with a comment
step4.desc: Post something on Instagram or Facebook, comment with your keyword and check that you receive the automatic DM within seconds.

rgpd.title: GDPR compliance ‚Äî what we do
rgpd.description: The user initiates contact by commenting ‚Üí implicit consent. Every DM automatically includes 'Reply STOP to unsubscribe'. Meta's 24h window naturally limits unsolicited messages.

empty.title: No automations yet
empty.description: Create your first automation to automatically reply to comments on Instagram and Facebook.

dm.title: Auto DM on Comment
dm.description: Post 'Comment PDF to get your free guide'. When someone comments 'PDF', they automatically receive your link via DM.
dm.example: Post: 'Comment PDF üëá' ‚Üí Comment 'PDF awesome' ‚Üí Auto DM with the link
dm.defaultMessage:
Hey {{firstname}}! Thanks for your comment üôå Here's your free guide: [YOUR_LINK]

email.description: The user comments a keyword, receives a DM asking for their email, then gets the guide delivered to their inbox via systeme.io.
